name: Tarzan
description: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.
keywords: tarzan character,tearing a page from a book,africa,death of parents,title at the end

review.author: gazzo-2
review.heading: Chimp champ
review.reviewBody: This is a great film, it moves right along fast, has great characters, action, voice, music is just right, great animation, you name it. Lives up to the Tarzan heritage and then some. I highly recommend this one.\n\nDefinitely something to jump up and down about.
